description: Definitions for Governance Fallback Mechanisms (GFRM) used across GSEP protocols.

GFRM:HALT_PROTOCOL.description: Protocol failed early validation; stop execution immediately.

GFRM:INIT_ROLLBACK_SST_PREV.description: Fallback to previously stable system state, utilizing known checkpoints.

GFRM:RECALCULATE_CONTEXT.description: Context synthesis failed; attempt recalculation up to two times.

GFRM:LOG_AND_RETRY_S_04.description: Constraint failure detected; log event and restart metric generation phase (S_04) to derive new viability metrics.
